full_summary:
**Flash Metallization Economic Assessment Tender Announcement**
=============================================================

### Tender Details

| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Notice Reference**: | cb-5245-50963658 |
| **Amendment Number**: | 2 |
| **Solicitation Number**: | NRCan-500073365 |
| **Publication Date**: | 2023-05-04 |
| **Tender Closing Date**: | 2023-06-06T14:00:00 |

### Tender Description

Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) invites proposals for an Association for the Advancement of Cost Engineering (AACE) Class 5 cost estimate for a 4 MMTPY steelmaking facility utilizing CE-O's Flash Metallization technology. The successful proponent will provide an estimate of all capital and operating expenses, as well as analyze conventional Direct Reduced Iron and Blast Furnace facilities of equivalent scale.

The proposed report will assess the sensitivity of the facilities to changing market conditions and determine the overall competitiveness of Flash Metallization steelmaking technology. The successful proponent will develop a cost estimate report that meets the requirements outlined in the tender document.

### Tender Requirements

The following conditions apply to this tender:

* The tender is open to all interested parties.
* The selection of the successful proponent will be based on Lowest Price.
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

### Contracting Entity

* Contractor: Natural Resources Canada
* Address: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E4

### Contact Information

* Bianca Moore
* Email: [bianca.ann.moore@gmail.com](mailto:bianca.ann.moore@gmail.com)
* Phone: (343) 543-4785

### Additional Resources

* Tender Document: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5245/rfp---nrcan--500073365.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5245/rfp---nrcan--500073365.pdf)

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-06T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined
* Expected Contract End Date: To be determined
